    inline int sn()
    {
        int n=0;
        int ch=gc();
        while( ch <48 )ch=gc();
        while( ch >47 )
        n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=gc();
            return n;
    }
    inline void wi(int n)
    {
        int N = n, rev, count = 0;
        rev = N;
        if (N == 0) { pc('0');  return ;}
        while ((rev % 10) == 0) { count++; rev /= 10;} //obtain the count of the number of 0s
        rev = 0;
        while (N != 0) { rev = (rev<<3) + (rev<<1) + N % 10; N /= 10;}  //store reverse of N in rev
        while (rev != 0) { pc(rev % 10 + '0'); rev /= 10;}
        while (count--) pc('0');
    }

    ll f(ll a)
    {
        if(a==0 || a==1) return 1;
        return a*f(a-1);
    }

    int main()
    {
        int t,i;
        t=sn();
        while(t--)
        {
            ll n,ans;
            ans=0;
            scanf("%lld",&n);
            fu(i,2,n)
            {
                if(i%2==0)
                {
                    ans=ans+f(n)/f(i);
                    //pi(0);pn;
                }
                else
                {
                    ans=ans-f(n)/f(i);
                    //pin(1);
                }
                //pi(i);ps;pll(ans);pn;
            }
            pll(ans);pn;
        }

        return 0;
    }
